content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Christina Applegate is now a married woman.

The sitcom star – who recently dropped out of Up All Night after NBC ordered creative changes – exchanged vows over the weekend with her boyfriend of four years, Martyn LeNoble.

The couple got engaged on Valentine’s Day 2010 and have a two-year old daughter together named Sadie Grace.

 

LeNoble helped found the 1990s rock band Porno for Pyros and has been credited for helping Applegate fight her way through a breast cancer diagnosis.

Applegate, meanwhile, is well on her way to recovery – and also on her way to Anchorman 2. We cannot wait for that comedy.
